lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini's plans to play captain Vincent Kompany in Tuesday's Champions League quarter-final, second-leg against Paris St Germain could rekindle his feud with Belgium manager Marc Wilmots over the defender.

headline.print_headline: Pellegrini Risks Belgium Ire With Desire to Play Kompany
headline.main: Pellegrini Risks Belgium Ire With Desire to Play Kompany

snippet: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini's plans to play captain Vincent Kompany in Tuesday's Champions League quarter-final, second-leg against Paris St Germain could rekindle his feud with Belgium manager Marc Wilmots over the defender....
